plot: A man attempts to avoid being castrated by his father-in-law who is furious that the man took two mistresses into his daughter's house
title: Hogeol Chun-pung
plot_es: A man attempts to avoid being castrated by his father-in-law who is furious that the man took two mistresses into his daughter's house
plot_en: A man attempts to avoid being castrated by his father-in-law who is furious that the man took two mistresses into his daughter's house
